title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXV, subch. B, pt. 2164 - Applications
content:

State Regulations
§ 2164.1 - Application requirements
§ 2164.2 - Application information
§ 2164.3 - Statement of need
§ 2164.4 - Narrative overview of proposed project(s) or program
§ 2164.5 - Methodology proposed to meet the need
§ 2164.6 - Proposed project(s) or program financing and leveraging plan
§ 2164.7 - Project(s) or program schedule
§ 2164.8 - Qualifications of participants
§ 2164.9 - The administration and disbursement plan of the eligible applicant

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXV, subch. B, pt. 2164

Statutory authority: Private Housing Finance Law, §
1113[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
